title: Post-Champ Selection Error.
body:
I have been playing League of Legends since Season 2, I have had such high tolerance for an error up until now because i have to retry atleast 3-4 times instead of once which was bearable.

EDIT: I forgot to mention, this error happens EVERY SINGLE TIME after champ select going into loading screen.

I simply cannot find a way, I went onto reddit, I searched through here and i simply cannot find a solution to this error, I cannot make this error go away for good. I know for sure that it isn't my firewall because i disabled it to test if it actually was, I disabled my anti-virus and made exceptions to the ports that LoL uses so that it would actually allow the connections, I still come up with this error and i'm starting to think that this error is unsolvable or it has no solution, and if that's the case, then that REALLY sucks.

Please help me fix this goddamned satan spawn of an error..
Thank you!

replies.body: I seriously need help with this.. Bump!
